TowerDefense

Class Smoke

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.GameObject
      • TowerDefense.GameObjectPlus
        • TowerDefense.Smoke

  • public class Smoke
extends GameObjectPlus
    Smoke teleports characters and is characterized by its poofiness. It is like a magical vehicle that moves Towers from one Tile to another Tile.
    Author:
    Branden Drake, Rachel Horton
